item.title: Get Paid to Take a Cell Phone
item.description: Thinking about a new cell phone but don’t want to spend $100? You don’t have to! Getting a new phone doesn’t mean emptying your wallet. While discounts are common, you can even find completely free phones. It’s true that the newest smartphones can be expensive, but there are plenty of free options available. The key is to shop online instead of in retail stores. Online, you can browse cell phone deals and service plans at your own pace, without pressure from salespeople.
